title: 'Fantastic hands' - But no evidence: The construction of exp
author: Pedersen; Inge Kryger; Baarts; Charlotte
description: Both in the Scandinavian welfare states and elsewhere the private CAM market acts as a health provider alongside the state. There is very limited established scientific evidence for the effects of tre
